body:
Hey guys!
Tell me about your family :D
List everybody in your family and tell me about them in a few words (Hobbies, attitude)

My Family
Mom - Sweet, nice, and supportive
Dad - Friendly, also supportive 
Brother - Knows a lot about audio and computer equipment, and very awesome
Sister - Can be mean, but mostly quiet
body_tagged:
Hey guys!
Tell me about your family :D
List everybody in your family and tell me about them in a few words (Hobbies, attitude)

My Family
Mom - Sweet, nice, and supportive
Dad - Friendly, also supportive 
Brother - Knows a lot about audio and computer equipment, and very awesome
Sister - Can be mean, but mostly quiet
title: Your Family

replies.body:
Dad: Has anger issues, gets steaming mad pretty much every day for the slightest thing (misplaced spoons, forks, knives, no eating utensils due to being washed or just finished being washed in the washing machine, e.t.c.). I can go on with many other examples, but eh. Otherwise I ask him to get something I need a very good point or else it's a definitive no, but he does care about my sister and I when he is not mad. o xd, forgot, 2 years ago, my sister misplaced the tv remote, had a friend who came to pick me up, had him wait 10 minutes for me because me dad got really pissed at me because my sister misplaced the remote, had to find it and found it in the washroom 10 min later xd.
Mom: Has a tough life with my dad, always saying that if my sister and I weren't born or we were already out of the house she would leave my dad. Staying with him for us, she says we need a dad to grow mentally healthy. I know she cares and it's nice but she can spaz out at anything little that peeves her off and starts screaming that we are going to get her killed one day from all the "stress" we are putting on her. Other from that little issue she is awesome.
Sister: Little brat who will cry if she doesn't get what she wants (she is 8 years old, grade 2 or 3). She won't eat anything unless she likes it or it's sweets, has her toys laying around everywhere in the house. Worst part. I'm on me laptop when I'm not allowed because when I'm allowed it's usually at 9 when I finish everything. Even then I only get like 20 min because it's late, no matter if it's on the weekend or not... guess who isn't allowing me? my dad. But back to the point, sister always trying to get me in trouble trying to see if I'm playing. So if ya see me randomly go afk in the middle of a game it's either my mom, dad or sister who is awlking around xd. And every now and then I still wonder why I help her and care for her when she needs help or I just get her an expensive gift on her birthday heh. Guess I'm just a good brother.

Can't wait to turn 18!1!1! Gettin' myself an apartment probably :D Livin' alone :)

replies.body:
I have a mom, a dad, a 2 sisters, and a dog.
Fun fact: I'm the only boy in my generation.
replies.body_tagged:
I have a mom, a dad, a 2 sisters, and a dog.
Fun fact: I'm the only boy in my generation.

replies.body:
Papa Alek: Pretty chill, though he can get mad sometimes when he loses in Call of Duty. Puts him in a horrible mood for the rest of the night.

Momma Alek: Very caring, short fuse. Somehow she is caring even when she is totally pissed. Ilymama

Sister #1: Left our house as soon as she could. Now she is desperate for a husband and has dated multiple dudes in the past couple years. Yes, we all feel sorry for her.

Sister #2: Tags along with me when I have to go places. We both be hard partiers. Spends most of the time in her bedroom behind a locked door when she is not up and about.

Sister #3: Not much to say about her. Love her none the less.

Sister #4: A little brat who tries to fight people whenever she gets the chance.

Brother Alek: Lego fanatic. Hard core gamer for an 8 yr old. His main goal in life is to become better than me at Minecraft.

Sister #4: A little brat who tries to fight people whenever she gets the chance.

Brother Alek: Lego fanatic. Hard core gamer for an 8 yr old. His main goal in life is to become better than me at Minecraft.

replies.body:
I have a father and a mother, a sister and two brothers.

I wouldn't say my relationship to my father is great due to our past but we are working on it, it's difficult when you have witnessed and been a victim of violence for so long. 

I would give the world to my mother, if I could, she is the reason why I try to never threat anyone wrong and when/if I do foolish mistakes she is the reason I swallow every ounce of my pride and apologize. 

I never meet my older brother and sister, it's mainly because we have different opinions about something and I don't want to be associated with them. 

I try to meet and spend as much time with my younger brother as I can but I work so much so yeah.
replies.body_tagged:

I never meet my older brother and sister, it's mainly because we have different opinions about something and I don't want to be associated with them. 

I try to meet and spend as much time with my younger brother as I can but I work so much so yeah.

replies.body:
Dad- Extremely hard working and does an amazing job at his work, pushes me to be better at everything (I get my competitiveness from him).
Mom- Really awesome, we don't argue as much as we used to, though she gets mad and stressed very easily. 
Brother #1- I'm not very close with him, he's away at college and I don't see him often. He showed me a lot of video games and let me hijack his Xbox a lot when I was younger.
Brother #2- I'm not really close with him, sometimes we watch Netflix together.
Overall I'm extremely thankful for the family I've been given. I wouldn't ask for them any other way.

replies.body:
Är du helt bakom flötet? 

I don't understand why someone would be offended by reality. It's like we would tell people not to watch the news or read the papers because it wouldn't be a "good influence" on them. 

If you are 12 or over 12 and get offended by someone else's past, you need to talk to someone.

replies.body:
I actually think that in some instances it is. If a parent is quite old, then their parents would have most likely hit them (or their grandparents hit their parents) and that action probably passed down. Even if a parent isn't that old abuse can be simply passed down. As for the offensive bit, I'm not going to go into much detail but the things some people have done to their own children... A smack is very minor to these things

But even so, some people have been uncomfortable because of my post, so I changed it-even if I didn't need to. The past is in the past. (Sorry off topic to the reply .-.)

replies.body:
Dad: Had a rough childhood, was doing drugs by the age of 12. He stopped his drug/alcohol addictions when I was around six. He has since turned his life around, and is always helping people in their recovery. But he was left with serious health issues, and probably has limited time. However, he is working towards becoming a Substance Abuse Councillor and has improved in health a bit.
Mom: Spent a lot of her life dealing with my dad's issues, and is really just working towards making as much money she can as a nurse. Sleeps alot, complains alot, but Im a total momma's boy so.
Sister 1: Got out of college a year early, took a break and is to lazy to do much anymore. Her laziness annoys me so much, but she can be cool somtimes.
Sister 2: Oh god, this one. Thankfully about to go off to college, but she is so freaking annoying. Bugs em all day, turned into some sort of fitness addict, and is really, really weird. (She takes her pillow from when she was like, 3 EVERYWHERE.) However we often tend to get along when making fun of others.
